title: All bonding discount rates cannot be discounted by more than 10% from the price.
body: The bonding discount rate is still approaching 50%. This is ruining game theory and ruining prices. New bonding should also offer only a 10% discount rate without exception. All bonding discount rates will be changed to a discount rate of not more than 10% as soon as voting is over. This continues until the price of the RA token reaches $80.
author: 0x56fF0f669769d46fDdAeE78a9e41f2dFDC9DCf2d
